titleStmt.title: An apologie for Iohn Wickliffe shewing his conformitie with the now Church of England; with answere to such slaunderous obiections, as haue beene lately vrged against him by Father Parsons, the apologists, and others. Collected chiefly out of diuerse works of his in written hand, by Gods especiall providence remaining in the publike library at Oxford, of the honorable foundation of Sr. Thomas Bodley Knight: by Thomas James keeper of the same.
titleStmt.author: James, Thomas, 1573?-1629.
Wycliffe, John, d. 1384.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Joseph Barnes, printer to the Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: Most (all?) copies were issued with STC 25589 (STC).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
